Translations.Text: ninnalkk avasyamullateakke avan ninnalkk nalkiyirikkunnu. allahuvinre anugraham ninnalkk ennikkanakkakkanavilla. tirccayayum manusyan katutta akramiyum valare nandikettavanum tanne
ibrahim paranna sandarbham: "enre natha! ni i natine nirbhayatvamullatakkename. enneyum enre makkaleyum vigrahapujayil ninnakarri nirttename
enre natha! i vigrahannal ereppere valiketilakkiyirikkunnu. atinal enne pintutarunnavan enre alan. arenkilum enne dhikkarikkunnuvenkil, natha, ni ere pearukkunnavanum dayaparanumallea.”

nannalute natha! enre makkalil cilare, krsiyillatta i talvarayil, ninre adaraniya mandirattinatutt nan tamasippiccirikkunnu. nannalute natha! avar namaskaram nisthayeate nirvahikkananat. atinal ni janamanas'sukalil avareat atuppamuntakkename. avarkk aharamayi kaykanikal nalkename. avar nandi kaniccekkam
nannalute natha! nannal maraccuvekkunnatum teliyiccukanikkunnatumellam niyariyunnu.” allahuvilninn marannirikkunnatayi onnumilla- bhumiyilum akasattum
vayas'sukalatt enikk isma'ilineyum is'hakhineyum sam'manicca allahuvin stuti. tirccayayum enre nathan prarthana kelkkunnavanan
enre natha! enne ni namaskaram nisthayeate nirvahikkunnavanakkename. enre makkalil ninnum attarakkare untakkename; nannalute natha! enre i prarthana ni svikariccalum
nannalute natha! vicarana nalil ni enikkum enre matapitakkalkkum muluvan satyavisvasikalkkum mappekaname.”
akramikal pravartticcukeantirikkunnatinepparri allahu asrad'dhananenn ninnal karutarut. avan avare kannukal turiccupeakunna oru nalilekk pinticcitunnuvenneyullu
